title: Linux umount Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux umount command, learn how to unmount mounted file systems, and discover practical examples to manage your file system effectively.

meta.title: Linux umount Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux umount command, learn how to unmount mounted file systems, and discover practical examples to manage your file system effectively.
meta.keywords: Linux, umount, file system, mount, unmount, disk management, system administration

verify.name: Verify the umount command
verify.hint: The verification script checks if the /mnt/example mount point is still present in the output of the `mount` command. If the mount point is still present, the script will exit with a non-zero status, indicating that the umount operation was not successful.
